Today, as we celebrate Independence Day, let‚Äôs promise to stay dedicated in honouring that legacy by contributing to our society. We wish everyone a very Happy Independence Day! ‚ÄúThe session was truly outstanding. The focus on real-world applications and interactive elements made the learning process incredibly engaging and effective giving us practical insights into cybersecurity." expressed the students of Government College of Technology Faisalabad. During this Industrial Visit at our Faisalabad Office, Mr. Muhammad Usman Ilahi and Mr. Faisal Zia, Deputy Managers, spoke to the students about Nayatel's hiring procedures and its significant role in the fields of cybersecurity. #Nayatel #IndustrialVisit #StudentEmpowerment #GCT

Nayatel partners with Hum Network Ltd to display live news tickers on digital screens with BoostBoard. The integration of live news into digital signage not only increases viewership in customer areas such as shops, malls, hotels, airports, banks and hospitals, but also ensures that viewers remain informed about the breaking news when they see signage screens. Nayatel has also upgraded its digital signage solution (now known as Boostboard), making it easy and user-friendly for brands to display public information, promotions, and product details on display TVs. As Hum TV is known for authentic and balanced news reporting, the partnership has great future potential and will offer significant growth to businesses that would use BoostBoard to display their content. https://lnkd.in/eFJDUBTd https://humnews.pk/ Nayatel | HUM Network | Hum Network Ltd | HUM News |

"Our experience at Nayatel went beyond just technical learning; it has significantly contributed to our professional growth as well. The best part of it was the inclusive atmosphere created by supervisors and the overall positive culture‚Äù expressed our interns. Bidding farewell to this season‚Äôs first batch of interns ‚Äì our life long ambassadors. #Internship #Learning #Nayatel #farewell #Nayatel

"I am amazed how we covered so many topics on professional development during this session in such little time" remarked Unaiza Jamil, one of our intern. A resourceful leadership session for our interns was led by Mr. Armughan Riaz, Senior Manager and Official Trainer at Nayatel. His engaging activities and insights kept the interns attentive and provided valuable skills for their future careers. #Internship #Nayatel #InternTraining #LeadershipDevelopment

‚ÄúGoing in, I was skeptical, that a continuous 8-Hours Training Session might not hold my attention. But I was pleasantly surprised! We are grateful to the management for arranging such sessions that are incredibly impactful.‚Äù Says Muhammad Faisal Shaheen, from our 50th Batch of NSE, as renowned corporate trainer Mr. Usman Gulzari trained them onto how to ‚ÄòReinvent Yourself‚Äô. #training #NSE #50thBatch
